info.title: v2 AppConnect API
info.description: Use the API Tester to make API calls to a Constant Contact account. The API Tester requires an API key and an access token that grants access to data in a Constant Contact account. If you have forgotten or do not have a token, click the Get Access Token button below. API for managing contacts, lists, email and event campaigns, and other Contant Contact resources.

get.summary: Method to retrieve information about the account.

put.summary: Method to retrieve information about the account.

get.summary: Method to retrieve the list of email addresses ass...
get.description: Method to retrieve the list of email addresses associated with the account (not contact email addresses).

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter the response based on the email address status: CONFIRMED or UNCONFIRMED

post.summary: Method to create a new email address associated wi...
post.description: Method to create a new email address associated with the account (not a contact email addresses).

get.summary: Method for retrieving a list of contacts.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Search for a  contact by email address

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter the response based on the email address status: CONFIRMED or UNCONFIRMED

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of contacts to return per page, 1-500, default 50

parameters.name: modified_since
parameters.description: Retrieve only contacts modified since the time specified (in ISO-8601 format)
